name: Discord
description: Discord is a communication platform for creating communities, offering voice, video, and text channels, along with tools for moderation and integration with other services.

name: EtherScan
description: Etherscan is a blockchain explorer for the Ethereum network, enabling users to search and verify transactions, addresses, and other blockchain data in real-time.

name: Microsoft
description: Microsoft is a multinational tech company known for products like Windows OS, Microsoft Office, Azure cloud services, Xbox gaming consoles, and Surface PCs.

name: Google
description: Google is a tech giant offering internet-based services and products including a search engine, online advertising, cloud computing, and software like Android OS and Google Workspace.

name: WeatherApi
description: WheaterApi will allow you to get the weather of a city
